headline: Is DTE Energy Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether DTE Energy is still a smart buy at around $127 a share, you are not alone. This breakdown is designed to help you figure out if the current price really makes sense. Despite a solid track record, the stock has slipped about 1.7% over the last week and 5.5% over the last month, though it remains up 5.4% year to date and 9.8% over the past year. This hints that recent weakness may just be noise in a longer upward trend. Much of the recent price action has been...

headline: Massive AI Data Center Power Deal Could Be A Game Changer For DTE Energy (DTE)
summary: Earlier in December 2025, Michigan regulators unanimously approved DTE Energy’s long-term contracts to supply about 1.4 gigawatts of power to a planned US$7.00 billion hyperscale data center in Saline Township, with conditions to prevent cost shifts to other customers and protect grid reliability. On December 19, 2025, DTE Energy also established a US$1.50 billion at-the-market equity program, giving the utility added financial flexibility to fund grid upgrades, storage and other investments...
